title: Mocca Cafe | Diverse Cafe ordering applications
description: Easily search, compare, and purchase coffee from reputable stores. Let's explore and experience the amazing flavors of coffee with us!

footer.title04: Open a restaurant on Mocca Cafe

errors.err04: Password must contain at least 8 characters and 1 special character @-_
errors.err08: The phone number is incorrect, please re-enter
errors.err12: Please log in to use this feature
errors.err15: Name must be between 3 and 50 characters.
errors.err16: Please enter House Number, Alley, Street.

birthDay.err01: Please enter your date of birth.
birthDay.err02: Date of birth cannot be later than today.
birthDay.err03: You must be at least 18 years old to use our service.
birthDay.err04: Sorry, you are too old to use our service.

password.err01: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least 1 special character.

cart.desc02: Add products to your cart and place your order here.
cart.desc04: Delivery fee will be automatically calculated after you place the order.

login.heading: Sign in
login.desc01: Welcome back. Sign in to continue shopping.

sign-up.heading: Sign up
sign-up.desc01: Let's start creating a new account to fully experience our features and services.

forgot-password.heading: Recover password
forgot-password.desc01: Send a forgotten password verification code via email.

verify-otp.heading: Verify OTP
verify-otp.desc01: Enter the OTP sent to your email.

reset-password.desc01: Please enter your new password in the box below.
